sections.text:
Section 17a-301a is repealed, effective October 31, 2017.

(P.A. 05-280, S. 53; P.A. 06-188, S. 54; June Sp. Sess. P.A. 07-2, S. 25; Sept. Sp. Sess. P.A. 09-5, S. 19; P.A. 10-179, S. 24; P.A. 11-44, S. 145; June 12 Sp. Sess.
